overview: This series takes you to life on the edge, where everyday darlings embrace being naughty. Featured cover girl Gizelle Blanco has an overprotective father and a bodyguard who makes her want to do dirty things. If she can catch her man off-guard, this loose cannon might unload on her, and that's just the way Gizelle wants to play. Liya Silver, Haley Spades, and Stefany Kyler are all up for a little corruption.
title: Baddies 6
